author: fhilip.k
title: ADA Holder Engagement Survey - AIM
description: Catalyst requires a broad, global base of engaged voters for the decentralized governance experiment to succeed.
solution: Create incentivized surveys to obtain info from a statistically significant number of voters and distribute this data to guide improvements.
experience: AIM created & maintains the voter-tool, CA-tool, vCA-Tool and the Community Landing Page. Developers, designers, leaders, and data experts.
